attributes.action: utilise tax payers money for the purchase of more British made Jaguar cars for ministerial use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a proud British citizen I would like to see more Jaguar cars, used for ministerial purposes, The multi award winning Jaguar XF would be an ideal car for the government to showcase to the world.

This would go a long way to showing that our Government supports the British motor industry and the thousands of workers who work within it.
